item.description: Well, we could have done a regular Cinco de Mayo get together- but that's not so original. So, we are being ultra cool and celebrating Seis de Mayo. And since it's all about hanging out, drinking margaritas and enjoying good food- does it really matter when we have it?? Everyone pays for their own/food drink.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I'll be wearing a red jacket and large red purse. If you can't find us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Come enjoy margaritas (or other great drinks), enjoy good food, meet new people, relax and have fun). Cure your Cinco de Mayo hangover with another margarita!
item.name: Seis de Mayo Party (Margaritas, Mexican food and lots of good times)
